description:
You know what it's like.... You see a great looking Wordpress template, you get all excited and go ahead and purchase it. You install and upload it and sadly it looks nothing like the demo template did before you purchased it. :-s

You need this course that will show you the 3 most popular ways to quickly and easily install a wordpress theme and get it to look as great as it did in the demo.

The 3 different methods that we will be covering are:

  1. Installing a template via admin - install any of the free templates that are available to you within the admin area.
  2. Purchase & then download a packaged them and then upload to your website & install.
  3. Download the files of a theme and then upload via FTP to your website.
Once you have the know how installing a wordpress theme is easy. You can even make money charging other people to install their wordpress theme for them. Anything from $5 to $20!
Learn this great new skill by taking the course TODAY!
title: Install a Wordpress Theme the Correct Way & Charge Others
